abort(bytes32).notice: abort - Aborts a rollout, rolling back to the pre-rollout state.

advance(bytes32).notice: advance - Moves the rollout to the next step, increasing traffic weight.

begin(string,string,string[]).notice: begin - Starts a new progressive rollout with the given strategy and steps.

pause(bytes32,string).notice: pause - Pauses an active rollout with a reason.

status(bytes32).notice: status - Returns the current state of a rollout.
